# QA Lead â€” Release Checklist

Use this checklist when preparing for major releases.

## Test plan
- [ ] Test plan created and linked (include brief test scope summary).
- TODO: add link to test plan artifact.

## Environments & data
- [ ] Test environments available and validated (staging/pre-prod).
- [ ] Test data prepared and documented.

## Regression & smoke testing
- [ ] Smoke tests passing in pre-prod.
- [ ] Regression suite executed; results documented.

## Automated tests
- [ ] CI automated tests relevant to release passed.
- [ ] Critical automated tests are included in the regression suite.

## Acceptance criteria & UAT
- [ ] Acceptance criteria confirmed with Product Owner.
- [ ] User Acceptance Testing (UAT) performed (if applicable).

## Defect triage
- [ ] Defect triage process defined for this release.
- [ ] High/critical defects have owners and mitigation plans.

## Sign-off
- [ ] QA sign-off documented (include date and scope).
- [ ] QA Lead provides go/no-go recommendation to Release Manager and PM.

## Artifacts & links
- Test plan: TODO: link
- Regression results: TODO: link
- Known issues list: TODO: link

## Post-release verification
- [ ] Post-release smoke checks defined and scheduled.
- [ ] Post-release validation pass/fail documented.
